title: Leadership Development Based on Observational Learning from a Relational Leadership Perspective

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic leadership concepts and at least two years of practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducting projects applying relational leadership models in environments enabling real-time collaboration through digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply key elements of observational learning (attention, motivation, social comparison, etc.) to real-world cases from a relational leadership perspective.
Learners can establish leadership growth strategies by analyzing interactions between peers and role models.
Learners can develop and execute action plans to maximize observational learning effects in specific situations (e.g., periods of organizational change).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
